## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] `cargo fmt` & `cargo clippy` (Clean)
- [ ] `cargo test` (Pass)

### Platform Support
- [ ] Native (Mac/Linux/Windows)
- [ ] WASM (Browser / `dev/0.0.5`+)

### Documentation
- [ ] Updated `task.md` Roadmap
- [ ] Added Screenshots/GIFs (for UI/Physics changes)
